short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert all fiat currencies into a crypto one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension converts all found USD and EUR amounts of any webpage into their corresponding BTC amount. The amounts are automatically converted when any page is loaded, USD or EUR being automatically detected and converted with their corresponding up-to-date rates.
Eventually, this extension will make you familiar with the growing use of crypto currencies in terms of their corresponding value in the _real life_.
